trans-unit.source: View the Last Protection Date of the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

seg-source.mrk: View the Last Protection Date of the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

target.mrk: Afficher la dernière date de protection de l'<MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

trans-unit.source: The last protection date is the last date at which you are able to restore data on your agent without losing any information. It does not mean that any data was backed up at that date.

seg-source.mrk: The last protection date is the last date at which you are able to restore data on your agent without losing any information.
It does not mean that any data was backed up at that date.

target.mrk: La dernière date de protection est la dernière date à laquelle vous êtes en mesure de restaurer les données de votre agent sans perdre aucune information.
Cela ne signifie pas nécessairement que des données ont été sauvegardées à cette date.

trans-unit.source: If no new data has been added since the last session at the time a new session is supposed to occur (according to the RPO parameter), the Last Protection Date is updated even though no new data has been protected.

seg-source.mrk: If no new data has been added since the last session at the time a new session is supposed to occur (according to the RPO parameter), the Last Protection Date is updated even though no new data has been protected.

target.mrk: Si aucune nouvelle donnée n'a été ajoutée depuis la dernière session au moment où une nouvelle session est censée avoir lieu (selon le paramètre RPO), la date de dernière protection est mise à jour même si aucune nouvelle donnée n'a été protégée.

trans-unit.source: To view the last protection date of the agent

seg-source.mrk: To view the last protection date of the agent

target.mrk: Pour consulter la dernière date de protection de l'agent

trans-unit.source: Hold the pointer over the icon in the task bar.

seg-source.mrk: Hold the pointer over the icon in the task bar.

target.mrk: Maintenir le curseur sur l'icône de l' dans la barre des tâches.
